text:
Message 3780 of 4024
I realize you did not sign in blood. But agreeing today and giving it serious thought is in itself still a commitment of great magnitude.
The fact that it happened after the week we had, in a sunny parking lot with church hymns singing in the background, was a sign of divinity.
My commitment to start the week:
• No flames  for any reason
• Write up and share Kari notes
• Write up and share Alan notes
• Tackle your Excel todo list
• Find and start DV classes
• Attend meeting with Jennifer
• Go to ADs hoops tryout
I’m sure there are more, but if you see something missing please just let me know. I assure you I will tackle it with speed and cooperation.
If we can even commit to giving each other a chance before handing it over to the lawyers, that alone is a huge victory for our kids & family.
Kids first! You and I, a close second
• robert
